summary: This document is a HUD-1 Settlement Statement detailing the financial transactions related to a mortgage loan. It outlines the amounts due from the borrower and to the seller, as well as various settlement charges associated with the loan. The document is significant as it provides a comprehensive breakdown of the financial aspects of the real estate transaction.

persons.name: Ronald J. Antonelli
persons.context: Ronald J. Antonelli is identified as the settlement agent responsible for preparing the HUD-1 Settlement Statement and certifying its accuracy.

keyFacts: The document is a HUD-1 Settlement Statement for a mortgage loan transaction.
The total amount due from the borrower is $319,488.77.
The total settlement charges amount to $3,471.06.
Ronald J. Antonelli certifies the accuracy of the HUD-1 Settlement Statement.
